document_data.title: Vampires
document_data.author: [[Jean Rabe]], [[Vince Garcia]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"Vampires"''' is a short adventure by [[Jean Rabe]] and [[Vince Garcia]] included in the 1988 accessory ''[[Lords of Darkness 1st edition|Lords of Darkness]]'' for 1{{st}} edition [[Dungeons & Dragons]].
